subject: Football
Sports Injuries
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell upheld his decision to suspend Jonathan Vilma, Will Smith, Anthony Hargrove and Scott Fujita for their alleged roles in the New Orleans Saints’ bounty scheme.
snippet: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell upheld his decision to suspend Jonathan Vilma, Will Smith, Anthony Hargrove and Scott Fujita for their alleged roles in the New Orleans Saints’ bounty scheme.
